General.Name: Tanac Automation Co Ltd
General.Description: Tanac Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, production, marketing, and sale of integrated automation systems and solutions worldwide. Its primary products include winding automation equipment, non-standard automation equipment, assembly automation equipment, test automation equipment, automation equipment, industrial robot application, smart factory, and others under the Tanac brand. The company also offers after sale services. It provides customized solutions for transformer inductance, motor manufacturing, consumer electronics, automobile, household appliance, medical, intelligent logistics, and other industries. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiashan, China.
